name: Stay focused!
description: Modifies REDCap behavior after Save & Stay clicked: (1) restores the data entry form to the location where you left off; (2) marks the last field saved; (3) suppresses the post-save 'required fields missing' popup dialog.

versions.changelog: Fixes fatal error on install caused by mismatch between class name and namespace.

versions.1.0.1: June 27, 2024 - updated for compatibility with REDCap 14.4.1 and LTS 14.0.32
versions.changelog: Fixes bug in current UI where the 'stay&save' button was considered a data entry field. Uses localStorage instead of cookies to store last field entered.
